amendment.description: An amendment numbered 102 printed in Part B of House Report 118-269 to prohibit funding to finalize or implement the proposed interpretive guidance of the Financial Stability Oversight Council titled "Authority To Require Supervision and Regulation of Certain Nonbank Financial Companies.".

vote.text: On agreeing to the Wagner amendment (A068) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Wagner amendment (A068) Agreed to by voice vote.
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Wagner amendment (A068) Agreed to by voice vote.
